be.ac.ulb.crashcoin.common.utils

Class Cryptography

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.crashcoin.common.utils.Cryptography

  • public class Cryptography
extends Object
    Utility class containing the cryptographic methods needed in the common package.

        public static byte[] hashBytes(byte[] data)
        Performs SHA-256 hash of the transaction
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to hash
        Returns:
        A 32 byte long byte[] with the SHA-256 of the transaction

      • deriveKey

        public static byte[] deriveKey(PublicKey key)
        Applies RIPEMD160 to retrieve the CrashCoin address from a public key.
        Parameters:
        key - Public key
        Returns:
        Byte representation of the CrashCoin address

        Returns:
        a PublicKey instance

      • createKeyPairFromEncodedKeys

        public static KeyPair createKeyPairFromEncodedKeys(byte[] publicKeyBytes,
                                                   byte[] privateKeyBytes)
        Convert encoded private and public keys (bytes) to Private / PublicKey interfaces and generate a KeyPair from them in order to construct a Wallet object in the signIn method
        Two different encoding
        Parameters:
        publicKeyBytes - the public key with encoding X509
        privateKeyBytes - the private key with encoding PKCS8
        Returns:
        the key pair

      • computeSecretKey

        public static SecretKey computeSecretKey(char[] userPassword,
                                         byte[] salt)
        Compute an encryption / decryption key (they are the same) from the password and the salt
        Parameters:
        userPassword - password of the user
        salt - extended string
        Returns:
        SecretKey

      • getPrivateKeyFomBytes

        public static PrivateKey getPrivateKeyFomBytes(byte[] privateKeyBytes)
        Transforms a byte array into a PrivateKey.
        Parameters:
        privateKeyBytes - the bytes to transform into a private key
        Returns:
        the private key associated to the byte array

      • generateKeyPair

        public static KeyPair generateKeyPair()
        Generates a DSA key pair, composed of a public key and a private key. The key size is defined in parameters. This method can be called at most one time per wallet.
        Returns:
        Pair of DSA keys

      • verifyPrivateKey

        public static Boolean verifyPrivateKey(KeyPair keyPair)
        The objective of this method is to verify that the private key that we've just decrypted in the login method using the user password is the valid one. If the user entered a wrong password the decryption cipher would still produce some results, i.e. a wrong private key To solve this, Antoine proposed to create a fake local trasaction with the private key that we've just decrypted and verify it with the public key associated with the user. If the transaction cannot be verified with the public key, then the private key and the password were wrong.
        Parameters:
        keyPair - the key pair
        Returns:
        True if signature is valid

      • walletInformationFromKeyPair

        public static WalletInformation walletInformationFromKeyPair(char[] userPassword,
                                                             KeyPair keyPair)
                                                      throws InvalidKeyException,
                                                             InvalidParameterSpecException,
                                                             IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                                             BadPaddingException
        Creates a WalletInformation from a password and KeyPair. The private key is encrypted with the password.
        Parameters:
        userPassword - the user-selected password, used to encrypt the private key
        keyPair - the public and private key pair
        Returns:
        a WalletInformation instance
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException
        InvalidParameterSpecException
        IllegalBlockSizeException
        BadPaddingException

      • keyPairFromWalletInformation

        public static KeyPair keyPairFromWalletInformation(char[] userPassword,
                                                   WalletInformation walletInformation)
                                            throws InvalidKeyException,
                                                   InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                                   IllegalBlockSizeException
        Creates a KeyPair from a WalletInformation. The private key is decrypted thanks to the password.
        Parameters:
        userPassword - the user-selected password used to decrypt the private key
        walletInformation - the WalletInformation containing the encrypted private key
        Returns:
        a KeyPair with the keys contained in walletInformation
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        IllegalBlockSizeException
